message: Let's make a deal! I take $60, you take $40. This seems fair considering the inflation working against you.
I think it's fairer to split the money more evenly, considering the inflation will affect my share in the next round. Let's do 55/45.
Bob, this is your last chance for a decent share! The inflation is eating away at your potential gains. Take the $35 now before it's worth even less.
